report.title: List of 100 species members
report.description: Lists members of the 100 species scheme and their progress.
report.query: select #columns# from users u join people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false join person_attribute_values vmember on vmember.person_id=u.person_id and vmember.person_attribute_id=30 and vmember.int_value=1 and vmember.deleted=false left join person_attribute_values vsent on vsent.person_id=u.person_id and vsent.person_attribute_id=31 and vsent.deleted=false left join ( select o.created_by_id, o.taxon_group_id, least(20, count(distinct o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key)) as sp_count from cache_occurrences_functional o join users u on u.id=o.created_by_id and u.deleted=false join person_attribute_values vmember on vmember.person_id=u.person_id and vmember.person_attribute_id=30 and vmember.int_value=1 and vmember.deleted=false where o.record_status='V' and o.website_id=8 group by o.created_by_id, o.taxon_group_id ) as rawdata on rawdata.created_by_id=u.id where u.deleted=false group by u.id, p.first_name, p.surname, vsent.int_value
